Screenwriter: Paul Dehn, Mort Abrahams, Paul Dehn
Synopsis: The second installment in "The Planet of the Apes" series. Here, an earthling sent to find the astronauts of the original film discovers not only a world of intelligent, talking apes, but an underground cult of grotesque "humans" who are the survivors of a nuclear blast years ago.
Title: Beneath the Planet of the Apes
